education.name: YouTube
education.desc: Streamed online gaming on YouTube,Twitch and Tiktok.

testimonials.title: Ayesha Galant
testimonials.desc:
Ridhaa Gabier is an exceptional individual who embodies both kindness and hard work. He consistently
                  go above and beyond in his tasks with attention to detail and dedication. His genuine care for
                  others makes them a joyful to work with and be around. I highly recommend Ridhaa for any endeavor he
                  pursue.

testimonials.title: Ayesha Galant
testimonials.desc:
Ridhaa is a very hardworking and dedicated person. He doesn't give up as easy as everyone else. Every
                  goal that he has set for himself, he has achieved. His not stopping till he reaches the top. He is a
                  motivation to everyone around him, and his personality makes others not give up and and reach their
                  full potential.

testimonials.title: Ayesha Galant
testimonials.desc:
Ridhaa is very kind and considerate towards others. When it comes to  his work, he is incredibly hard-working, focused and determined, and more so when there are issues. I
                enjoy working with him. He definitely has a lot of potential and I would highly recommend him.

testimonials.desc:
Ridhaa is dedicated and very passionate about his work. Working together
               makes me motivated to go above and beyond to reach our goals and of course, having fun while doing so.
